title: Job interview: whom would you hire? - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Four people are interviewed for three different positions in a restaurant - cashier, waiter, kitchenhand. After each interview you, the viewer, are told to rate the interviewee. Relevent to small businesses. NB: “The job interviews in this film are real. The applicants did not know they were bing photographed. Later, each one gave us permission to use the filme.”
